note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed and dated by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary
I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending 30th September 1881.

cell.p:
Paper for Lithograms
Paper for Lithograms crossed out.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 1.5pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
cell.p:
75
Each item in this column has been ticked.

Total — Five hundred pounds shillings and pen
and seven deleted before pounds, ten deleted before shillings.
